title: Dawn of the Deadly Fang
description: FITTING IN AT A NEW SCHOOL IS HARD...WHEN YOU’RE NOT HUMAN ANYMOREA mysterious plague is sweeping across the Great Plains, one that grants the ability to shapeshift—but with it comes an insatiable hunger for fresh meat.Sixteen-year-old Mia is Infected, but she’s a special case. Thanks to a strange genetic mutation, she not only has abilities other werewolves don’t possess, her blood might be the key to a vaccine.For Mia and many of the Infected, shapeshifting is a curse. Others, the Bad Dogs, revel in their new powers. For them, humans no longer belong at the top of the food chain. The Bad Dogs don’t want any vaccine, and they have a plan to end human dominance forever.Organized, powerful, and relentless, they’re willing to do anything for their cause—like abducting a busload of Mia's classmates.Mia must enlist the help of her teenage werewolf pack in a desperate gamble to rescue her friends, maybe even save the world.If you love stories with plucky teenage heroes, wild chase scenes, and the fate of the world hanging in balance, you'll love DAWN OF THE DEADLY FANG!
author: T. James Logan
